# accessibilityDescription

**Instance Property**

A localized accessibility description describing the compass direction.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessibilityDescription: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The description is suitable for Voice Over and other assistive technologies.

## Describing the compass direction

- **abbreviation**: A localized short abbreviation of the wind compass direction.
- **description**: A localized string describing the compass direction.
